title: Simple-slider – 1kb JavaScript Carousel
author: ruyadorno
content:
readme.md simple-sliderhttps://ruyadorno.github.com/simple-sliderextremely lightweight carousel micro library.simple-slider is carousel micro library based the requestanimationframe api. makes a highly testable implementation less css-dependent. package contains framework agnostic implementation. you are using angularjs polymer are simple-slider framework-specific implementations available:angular-simple-sliderpolymer-simple-sliderfeaturessmall size, less 1.2kb minified/gzippedsupport umd: amd, commonjs global definitionuses requestanimationframe animationssupports page visibility api pause/resume transitions user navigates away the pageaccept ease functions customize transition animationlots ready--use examples available, check example folderanimates numerical css propertyinstallavailable npm:npm install --save simple-slider you also it bower:bower install --save simple-slidergetting from cdnjs library is available https://cdnjs.com/ can it by importing:minified version: https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/simple-slider/1.0.0/simpleslider.min.jsunminified version: https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/simple-slider/1.0.0/simpleslider.jsusagesimply import script your html call simpleslider.getslider function.
this previous example didn't specified additional option, this case slider use default left--right sliding animation the container element be first element containing data-simple-slider attribute.usage a commonjs environmentvar simpleslider = require('simple-slider');simpleslider.getslider();es2015+ environmentsimport { getslider } 'simple-slider/src';getslider();requirejs/amd environmentrequire(['simple-slider'], function(simpleslider) { simpleslider.getslider();});optionsoptions are set named properties a single parameter accepted the getslider function, help customize slider transition how 's going work. main option is container element, will usually a
    containing elements be transitioned, keep mind this container should have defined width/height value. can tweak things such the delay between each transition, long each transition take, etc.
    available optionshere is list available values customize your slider is going work:container: html element act a container the slider. defaults document.queryselector('*[data-simple-slider]).children list children be used slides, can the queryselectorall have more flexibility what children the container element should used slides. defaults container.children.paused: controls carousel auto-transition/slideshow. value is true transition happen. defaults false.prop: determines css property be animated. defaults left.duration: value setting duration animation transition. defaults 0.5.delay: value determining wait between each animation auto-transition is enabled. defaults 3 seconds.init: initial value slide elements starting transition animation. defaults -100.show: value slide element should when is displayed. defaults 0.end: value slide move during transition animation. defaults 100.unit: css unit value be used. defaults %.ease: ease function, can any these. defaults defaultease internal function.onchange: callback function be invoked each a slide changes.onchangeend: callback function be invoked the end the slide transitiondefault values{ container: document.queryselector('*[data-simple-slider]'), children: container.children, paused: false, prop: 'left', duration: 0.5, delay: 3, init: -100, show: 0, end: 100, unit: '%', ease: defaultease function, onchange: undefined, onchangeend: undefined}programmatic api methods are exposed the returning value the function allowing to control slider.
    available methods:currentindex() returns index the current displaying image.pause() pauses slideshow.resume() resumes slideshow.reverse() swaps init end reverses order slides.nextindex() gets index the next slide be shown.previndex() gets index the previous slide.next() switches displaying image the next .prev() switches displaying image the previous .change(index) changes image a given index value.dispose() disposes all internal variable references.more examplesresponsive layout exampledefault slider no optionsdefault slider optionsfading/opacity transitionfull page transitionlightbox integratedmask sliding transitionpause sliderequirejs usagereverse sliding directionright left sliding transitionslides containing imagestop bottom transitiontouch swipe examplecustom ease animationdocumentationextensive documentation the options methods be found the simple-slider official documentation.alternatives javascript carousel micro library is a thing (fun fact, simple-slider has been around since 2013). would recommend you a at of available alternatives decide yourself one better suits needs.slicklorysiemaswiperisliderowl carouselflickityswipeunsliderglidelicensemit © ruy adorno
